body.p: Can North/South make ? No, the timing is all wrong - the defense must get a heart and either a diamond or a second heart.
Obviously, is not going to work, losing the and a trump.
Does make? Not if, as is likely, it is declared by North - a diamond lead kills it. But what if it is, improbably, declared by South?
Indeed, by South does indeed make - all declarer needs is a single heart ruff and then he can pitch North's diamond losers on two long hearts and a club.
